Eve revived, or, The Fair one stark-naked a novell. Belle sans chemise. English. 1684. G. R.
[8], 120 p.
Printed by William Downing ..., London : 1684.
Translation of "La Belle sans chemise" -- Cf. preface. Preface signed: G.R. Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
